text: Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora sampradaya! Koraacona tomaloke, ma'i yadi mora pratipalakara paraa praeraita pramanata pratisthita thako arau te'om yadi moka te'omra taraphara paraa anugraha dana karae, tathapi'o yadi ma'i allahara abadhya ha'om, tente allahara sastira paraa moka kone raksa karaiba? Gatike tomaloke kerala mora ksatihe brd'dhi karai acha’
